Package ohos.data.rdb

Class StoreConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.rdb.StoreConfig

  • public class StoreConfig
extends Object
    Manages relational database configurations.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_APPDATAMGR

    • Method Detail

      • newDefaultConfig

        public static StoreConfig newDefaultConfig​(String name)
        Creates a database configuration using the default configuration by specifying the database name.

        The database created using this configuration is in disk storage mode and is both readable and writable.

        Parameters:
        name - Indicates the database name.
        Returns:
        Returns the created database configuration.
        Since:
        1

      • newMemoryConfig

        public static StoreConfig newMemoryConfig​()
        Creates an in-memory database configuration.

        The database created using this configuration is in memory storage mode and is both readable and writable.

        Returns:
        Returns the created database configuration.
        Since:
        1

      • newReadOnlyConfig

        public static StoreConfig newReadOnlyConfig​(String name)
        Creates a read-only database configuration by specifying the database name.

        The database created using this configuration is in disk storage mode.

        Parameters:
        name - Indicates the database name.
        Returns:
        Returns the created database configuration.
        Since:
        1
